sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from '../components/common/Sidebar'; import Header from '../components/common/Header'; import Card from '../components/common/Card'; import { NAVIGATION_ITEMS, ADMIN_STATS, DUMMY_DATA } from '../constants'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [activeItem, setActiveItem] = useState('dashboard'); const handleLogout = () => { navigate('/login'); }; const downloadReport = (type) => { alert(`Downloading ${type} report...`); }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'excellent': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; case 'good': return 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100'; case 'warning': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'; case 'error': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; const getSeverityColor = (severity) => { switch (severity) { case 'high': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; case 'medium': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100'; case 'low': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; const renderContent = () => { switch (activeItem) { case 'dashboard': return (
{/* Overview Stats */}
{ADMIN_STATS.overview.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.label}

{stat.value}

{stat.change} from last month

{stat.icon}
))}
{/* Charts & Analytics */}
📊

Revenue Chart

Monthly revenue trends
📈

Growth Chart

Patient & practitioner growth
{/* Real-time Transactions Table */}
{ADMIN_STATS.recentTransactions.map((transaction) => ( ))}
Transaction ID Patient Practitioner Therapy Amount Payment Date & Time Status Action

{transaction.id}

{transaction.transactionId}

{transaction.patient}

{transaction.practitioner}

 {transaction.therapy}

₹{transaction.amount}

 {transaction.paymentMethod}

{transaction.date}

{transaction.time}

 {transaction.status}

Showing 6 of 156 transactions

 {/* System Health */}
{ADMIN_STATS.systemHealth.map((health, index) => (
{health.metric}
{health.value} {health.status}
))}
); case 'analytics': return (

Analytics Dashboard

New Patients +45 this month
Retention Rate 87%
Avg Sessions 6.8 per patient
Avg Rating 4.8 ⭐
Utilization 78%
Revenue/Practitioner ₹54K
{['Abhyanga (35%)', 'Shirodhara (28%)', 'Panchakarma (22%)', 'Nasya (15%)'].map((therapy, index) => (
{therapy}
))}
); case 'users': return (

User Management

{DUMMY_DATA.patients.map((patient) => (
{patient.photo}

{patient.name}

{patient.email}

{patient.status}
))}
{['Dr. Priya Sharma', 'Dr. Rajesh Patel', 'Dr. Meera Singh'].map((name, index) => (
👨‍⚕️

{name}

Active • {[15, 12, 18][index]} years exp

Active
))}
); case 'revenue': return (

Revenue Management

₹45,200

+18% from yesterday

₹12.4L

+12% from last month

₹1.2Cr

+25% from last year
{/* All Transactions Table */}
{ADMIN_STATS.recentTransactions.map((transaction) => { const commission = Math.round(transaction.amount * 0.15); const netRevenue = transaction.amount - commission; return ( ); })}
Transaction ID Patient Practitioner Therapy Amount Payment Method Date & Time Status Commission Net Revenue

{transaction.patient}

{transaction.practitioner}

{transaction.date}

{transaction.time}

₹{netRevenue}
Total Transactions: 156 Total Revenue: ₹24.5L Total Commission: ₹3.7L Net Revenue: ₹20.8L
); case 'reports': return (

Reports & Downloads

{[ { title: 'Patient Reports', desc: 'Detailed patient analytics and treatment history', icon: '👥' }, { title: 'Revenue Reports', desc: 'Financial analytics and transaction details', icon: '💰' }, { title: 'Practitioner Reports', desc: 'Performance metrics and ratings', icon: '👨‍⚕️' }, { title: 'System Reports', desc: 'Technical logs and system health', icon: '⚙️' } ].map((report, index) => (
{report.icon}

{report.desc}

 ))}
); case 'system': return (

System Monitoring

{ADMIN_STATS.systemLogs.map((log) => (

{log.message}

{log.timestamp}

{log.severity}
))}
); default: return
Admin Dashboard
; } }; return (

Admin Control Panel

Monitor and manage your AyurSutra platform

{renderContent()}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
